text: Let us send happiness to all like a giant bouncing ball. It is your birthday so let us all play and sing happy birthday.
Happy birthday, my friend.
Happy, happy birthday!
You're a man now. Mozeltov!
Whoops... I slept through your birthday. #mybad
Happy birthday Mom. You don't look a day over 40.
You're the sexiest 30 year old wife that I know.
Happy birthday, you're old. - LOL
I cry every time I think of you. I love you, my son. Happy birthday.
Happy Birthday Grandma!
Happy haps gramps.
Happy sweet 16 my daughter, I love you.
Bro, happy-bro-birthday, bro.
Sorry I missed your special day. I still think you're the best sister ever!
Happy birthday Mom. You're the absolute best!
Happy birthday Dad. I think you're one of America's top 9,000,000 Dads. (Roughly top 10%)
Happy birthday Honey! My mother was so wrong about you.
It's been another year will a little blessing in my life - you as my grandson. Happy birthday.
It's been another year will a little blessing in my life - you as my granddaughter. Happy birthday.
Happy birthday to the world's best boss!
You're the team MVP. Well, at least for today.
You're the best boyfriend a girl could ask for. Let's make today special!
Prettier than a rose and more special than a princess is my girl on her birthday.
Happy Birthday! You’ve pushed me to do my best. Thank you!
Happy Birthday! You are my inspiration.
I love you so much. Thankful for you this day. Happy Birthday!
Here's to an incredible day for an incredible friend. Wishing you the happiest of birthdays!
Happy birthday lil’ brother! I can’t believe you are growing up so quickly. My gift to you is not beat you up this year- well, at least this week.
Happy Birthday! I hope you get everything you want today- you deserve it!
You are the best Grandma anyone could imagine. You bless (spoil) us, so we hope to spoil you today. Happy Birthday!
You are the best Grandpa anyone could imagine. You bless (spoil) us, so we hope to spoil you today. Happy Birthday!
You are the best Grandma anyone could imagine. You bless us, so we hope to bless you today. Happy Birthday!
You are the best Grandpa anyone could imagine. You bless us, so we hope to bless you today. Happy Birthday!
I didn't forget this year! Have the best birthday!
Cheers to (#) years! May this year be full of blessings!
I am blessed to be part of your birthday celebration. Cheers to you!
I am blessed to have you as part of my life. Happy Birthday!
With every year, you seem to be getting younger. How do you do it? Happy Birthday!
Wishing you many more birthdays!
We may sometimes argue and disagree, but I wish you the happiest of birthdays filled with glee
Happy birthday old man!
